mapper.insert: insert into ts_teacher_course (tc_id, course_no, teacher_no, term_id, appraise_sum, address, begin_week, end_week) values (#{tcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{termId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appraiseSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ts_teacher_course set course_no = #{courseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_no = #{teacherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term_id = #{termId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appraise_sum = #{appraiseSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_week = #{beginWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_week = #{endWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tc_id = #{tcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tc_id, course_no, teacher_no, term_id, appraise_sum, address, begin_week, end_week from ts_teacher_course where tc_id = #{tcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select tc_id, course_no, teacher_no, term_id, appraise_sum, address, begin_week, end_week from ts_teacher_course
